attributes.action: Introduce legislation to make the practice of  “Bundling” illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is an increasing practice from major retailers on the High Street and the Internet to take unfair advantage from the limited availability of various consumer items.  The most obvious of these practices is the sale of new games consoles where the purchaser it refused the right to purchase the just the console.  They are forced to purchase other items, in what are known as “Bundles”.

We consider this practise against the interest of the public and request that legislation be introduced to make the practice illegal.
